title: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500, Dow notch second week of gains, Nasdaq falters as bond yields rise - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500, Dow notch second week of gains, Nasdaq falters as bond yields rise  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks were mixed Friday but closed mostly higher for the week after a streak of up and down days on Wall Street as investors further mulled the path forward for interest rates and a host of new sanctions against Russia.
